EmailTemplate.subject: Foundation Lunch Menu - Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
This is a gentle reminder to send in the lunch menu (5th Nov â€“ 14th Dec 2012) for your child/children before the deadline Thursday, 25th October 2012 as Friday the 26th is a public holiday. This will assist the canteen staff to organise accordingly.
For those of you who have sent in the menu, kindly ignore this email.
Click here to download menu
Thank you and have a nice day.
Kind Regards,
Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education _______________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona -Marbella
